Hand Craft Cleaners

11401 Midlothian Tpke
Midlothian VA 23235

EPA ID#: VAD988169819

EPA web page for this facility

Area shown represents ENTIRE FACILITY

Institutional Controls for ENTIRE FACILITY include:

CA772EP - Enforcement and Permit Tools

This institutional control is an amended consent order with Virginia DEQ, issued 10/8/2013, requiring implementation of the groundwater remedy for the site. The order is available at:

Consent Order Link

CA772GC - Governmental Control

This institutional control is an ordinance in the Chesterfield County Code (Sec. 18-60) that requires commercial and residential buildings and dwellings to be served by the County water supply. The ordinance is available at:

https://library.municode.com/HTML/10531/level3/PTIITHCO_CH18WASE_ARTIIIOPEXUSUTSY.html#PTIITHCO_CH18WASE_ARTIIIOPEXUSUTSY_S18-60REUSUTSY

Engineering Controls for ENTIRE FACILITY include:

CA770GW - Groundwater Control

This engineering control consists of a closed-loop groundwater circulation system for in situ reductive dechlorination of contaminants in groundwater.
